faqs.q: How many calories are in a Chipotle tortilla?
faqs.a: Approximately 320 calories for one large flour tortilla.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Chipotle tortilla?
faqs.a: About 51g total carbs, including 3g fiber and 0g sugars.

faqs.q: Is a Chipotle tortilla high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, it has around 670mg sodium per tortilla.

faqs.q: How much protein in a Chipotle burrito tortilla?
faqs.a: Roughly 9g of protein per large tortilla.

faqs.q: Does Chipotle offer low-calorie tortilla options?
faqs.a: Standard is flour at 320 kcal; smaller sizes or bowl options (no tortilla) reduce calories.
